name: Exemption
description: Exemption became more than just a side project when two devs realized their passion for game development. It merges Rogue-like and Souls-like aspects for a action packed experience. Fight your way through changing landscapes and various enemies. Explore the ever-expanding realms of Exemption as one of the 7 current playable characters in game. Expect frequent updates as we expand our world with more levels, enemies, challenging bosses, and new playable characters.
